title: Kinda Funny Studio Update
description:

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody it's me greg miller from kind of funny and you know there's nothing kinda funny loves more than video games and we noticed just about every video game getting delayed and we said you know what we want to do that too ladies and gentlemen i'm here to announce to you that the kind of funny studio is being delayed that's right we of course we're going to open it on kind of funny day in january and as we have gotten closer and dealt with more building permits and more construction problems from coven and more you name it uh we realize we are coming in way too hot for that to actually work so we are here to announce uh with the roger go ahead put it up put up the cyberpunk uh letter put it start typing it dear gamers we are delaying the launch of the new kind of funny studio uh we aren't going to give you a new date right now because we're not 100 sure we're working on our contractor we're working the city uh it's going to be amazing but that means it's going to take a

uh we aren't going to give you a new date right now because we're not 100 sure we're working on our contractor we're working the city uh it's going to be amazing but that means it's going to take a lot of work and so rather than giving you another date we're playing it a little bit more casual so we are moving to the studio in 2022 we will return to working in person in 2022 it just won't be january it'll be as soon as we can but i think it's important to talk a bit about that right it's not as easy as cool the studio is up and running let's all run back into it you have to understand that and i am not over dramaticizing what we're doing here our studio is going to be on another level for anybody in our industry doing what we do it's going to be amazing and what that really means is we have to learn how to use all that stuff right kevin barrett directing shows us getting a workflow all these different things like we need time in there to start producing the shows we want to produce

have to learn how to use all that stuff right kevin barrett directing shows us getting a workflow all these different things like we need time in there to start producing the shows we want to produce the way we want to produce them so honestly i don't think any of this really matters that much to you i know you're excited to see the new studio i know you're excited for us to get back into it but we're doing really great content you're already a fan hopefully and so you'll still be in the shows everything is going to be as normal but we're not moving into the studio as we said in january but most importantly kind of funny day won't be happening in january as you know january is the anniversary of kind of funny uh going independent all of us starting off on this crazy journey together and usually uh we celebrate that day in the beginning of january and that's a whole bunch of new shows talk about our programming talk about what we're doing in that year and make a big push we're not

usually uh we celebrate that day in the beginning of january and that's a whole bunch of new shows talk about our programming talk about what we're doing in that year and make a big push we're not going to do that in january kind of funny day we'll wait for the new kind of funny studio because they go hand in hand you're right this is uh the biggest thing our company has ever done and on top of that this is the next decade of our company this building what we're building and what we're doing there so it just doesn't make sense to do something uh in january to celebrate what we are and then also in a couple i'm gonna say weeks months or whatever down the road in 2022 say all right cool now let's celebrate the studio instead kind of funny day we'll wait for the new kind of funny studio in 2022 whenever that will be of course if you want to know more about when it's coming it's easy keep following us we'll talk about it we're going to have it as soon as we have a date we can commit to

2022 whenever that will be of course if you want to know more about when it's coming it's easy keep following us we'll talk about it we're going to have it as soon as we have a date we can commit to that we're confident in we will let you know until next time ladies and gentlemen it's been our pleasure to serve you
